name: Beat Breaker
summary:
Begin your musical journey with beat breaker and drop some beats with stunning visuals at insane speed. 
 
enjoy the pure beats and some juicy visuals in your musical journey with classic gameplay of arkanoid and electronic music. 
 
FEATURES : 
 
1. STUNNING GRAPHICS 
 
Experience stunning graphics, lights, neon bloom and great visuals. 
 
2. CONTROLS 
 
Drag the paddle to protect the white ball and produce some cool beats. 
 
3. ELECTRONIC MUSIC 
 
Make music your own by producing beats with pumping electronic music. 
use headphones for the best experience. 
 
4. INSANE SPEED 
 
you gotta be fast to match up with the speed of the ball. 
 
 
Begin your musical journey now!!
